chapter.title: Tools
chapter.para: GoGui includes some tools. Some of the tools are GTP engines; they can be attached to GoGui as Go programs:

listitem.para: Adapter program for logging the GTP stream or doing protocol translations. See for a complete reference.
Connects to a Go program supporting GTP on a remote computer. See for a complete reference.
Go Text Protocol adapter showing the current board in a window. See for a complete reference.
Dummy Go program for testing GTP controllers. See for a complete reference.
Adapter program for playing games between two Go programs supporting GTP. See for a complete reference.
Runs GTP regression tests. See for a complete reference.
Runs a Go program supporting GTP and connects it input and output to a listen socket on the local computer, so that other programs can connect to it from the network. See for a complete reference.
Runs GTP commands on all positions of game collections. See for a complete reference.
Simple text based interface to Go programs supporting GTP. See for a complete reference.
Create thumbnails for SGF files. See for a complete reference.
Convert SGF and Jago XML Go game files to other formats. See for a complete reference.
